field.name: Pus draining from the eye OR | Mouth ulcers
Take Action: Measles with Eyes or Mouth Complications
Give First dose of Vitamin A per table below:
Counsel and give Second dose of Vitamin A to caregiver/mother to be given the next day
If patient has pus draining from the eye, treat eye infection with first dose of 1% tetracycline eye ointment or 0.5% Chloramphenicol eye ointment:
Teach caregiver/mother how to administer these eye ointments at home
If mouth ulcers persist, treat with gentian violet; teach mother not to allow child to drink or swallow gentian violet.
Treat any skin irritation with calamine lotion by applying to the affected areas
Give one dose of paracetamol per table below for fever and counsel mother to continue:
Counsel mother on feeding a sick child
Advice mother to return for care in 2 days
